import classes from "./MainHeader.module.css"; import {AiOutlineSearch} from "react-icons/ai"; import React from "react"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {cartActions} from "../../store/cart-slice"; const MobileHeader = () => { const cartQuantity = useSelector(state => state.cart.totalQuantity); const cartItem = useSelector(state => state.cart.items).find((item) => item.id === props.id); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const addToCartHandler = () => { dispatch(cartActions.addItemToCart({ id, title, price })); }; const removeItemHandler = () => { dispatch(cartActions.removeItemFromCart(id)); }; return (
